content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Looking Years Back in 2015…\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/topics/global/competencies-technologies/articles/2017/dec/ahold-delhaize-a-client-visit-to-kharkiv-of-unprecedented-scale_en.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ahold Delhaize. A client visit to Kharkiv of unprecedented scale\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":939593,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/56e73046-6bea-4f68-a7fd-380d411a363e/14.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/56e73046-6bea-4f68-a7fd-380d411a363e/14.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"14.PNG\",\"name\":\"14.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"56e73046-6bea-4f68-a7fd-380d411a363e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":714,\"height\":304},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Ahold Delhaize group of companies unites more than twenty brands in eleven countries to serve over fifty million shoppers every day. EPAM Story with Ahold Delhaize started in 2015. ЕРАМ worked with the company’s Belgium-based business department and the IT team in Belgium and Greece.  Initially the account was located mostly in the Kharkiv DEP Unit, with engineers also in Grodno, Minsk and Kyiv and onsite managers in Germany. The teams comprised professionals in Hybris, Mobile development, AQA, Performance and Security testing and DevOps. In 2017, EPAM helped Ahold Delhaize enter the Serbian and Romanian markets, with more to come.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=qokYBPJA\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/topics/global/competencies-technologies/articles/2017/jan/ahold_delhaize_netipichnyie_vyzovy_ru.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Share the Experience: Ahold Delhaize. Нетипичные вызовы крупного аккаунта\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1282070,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/352ea0db-f9c7-4b2a-9b30-f4270607487f/15.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/352ea0db-f9c7-4b2a-9b30-f4270607487f/15.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"15.PNG\",\"name\":\"15.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"352ea0db-f9c7-4b2a-9b30-f4270607487f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":608,\"height\":382},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Ahold Delhaize group of companies unites more than twenty brands in eleven countries to serve over fifty million shoppers every day. EPAM Story with Ahold Delhaize started in 2015. ЕРАМ worked with the company’s Belgium-based business department and the IT team in Belgium and Greece.  Initially the account was located mostly in the Kharkiv DEP Unit, with engineers also in Grodno, Minsk and Kyiv and onsite managers in Germany. The teams comprised professionals in Hybris, Mobile development, AQA, Performance and Security testing and DevOps. In 2017, EPAM helped Ahold Delhaize enter the Serbian and Romanian markets, with more to come.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
